GSD.description:
drm/amdkfd: Fix UBSAN shift-out-of-bounds warning

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.36 by commit 1874b0ef1426b873de94c61861e38f29a8df714c. For more details please see the references link.
